name: Melon
description:
Melon is a software development outsourcing company based in Bulgaria. 
Our talent spans from web to mobile, backed by a QA, System Support, and UX/UI and visual design departments. We are especially good at building teams that closely match our clients’ needed technological skillset and experience.
Melon’s team currently consists of more than 150 young and highly qualified professionals including web (.NET, PHP, Python, Ruby, SharePoint, HTML/JS) and mobile developers (iOS, Android, Windows Phone, Cross-platform, PhoneGap, Xamarine, Ionic, Unity), designers, interactive media and system support specialists, and quality assurance engineers.
